original_title: The Fifteen Mysteries of the Rosary: The Glorious Mysteries
overview: This video was produced by Fr. Patrick Peyton, the famous “Family Rosary Crusade” priest. It is a full-scale drama of the Glorious mysteries of the Rosary. It is a beautiful and reverent drama that brings to life the story and meaning of each of the mysteries of the Rosary. The lavish production was filmed in Spain in 1957 with a cast of thousands.
title: The Fifteen Mysteries of the Rosary: The Glorious Mysteries
